channel.title: Ember-Rsps
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i897.photobucket.com/albums/ac176/Aj1192/ember%20advert/title_zps92e397bc.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=verdana][size=14pt][url=http://www.ember-rsps.com][u]HomePage[/u][/url] [/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=verdana][size=14pt][url=http://www.ember-rsps.com/forums][u]Forums[/u][/url] [/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=verdana][size=14pt][url=http://www.ember-rsps.com/play.php][u]Play Now[/u][/url] [/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=verdana][size=14pt][url=http://www.ember-rsps.com/hiscores][u]Hiscores[/u][/url] [/size][/font][/center]
[center][b][b][font=verdana][size=14pt]Features and Information:
Revision: 317 Loading 474
Professional [url=http://www.ember-rsps.com/forums][u]Forums[/u][/url]
Excellent Hosting as well.[/size][/font][/b][/b][/center]
[center][size=14pt][font=verdana][b]Server-sided information: EVERY MINIGAME works (ones that are on teleport list) Hiscores handler re-written ALL anims are added server-wide Thieving class re-written Drop Tables re-coded for almost perfect economy Custom Donator Zone, never seen before! [/b][/font][/size][/center]
[b][center][size=14pt][font=verdana]Extra info: Shops are barebones setup, Item up to ADAMANTITE in shop, limited quantity Same with low level skilling items. XP Rates are SEMI LOW - If you plan to play for 2 hours and max out this is NOT the server for you. Items have meaning here, our ECONOMY IS Incredible. [/font][/size][/center]
[color=red][size=14pt][font=verdana][center][b]MEDIA BELOW[/b][/center]

item.description:
@Learning_Code wrote:

[center][/center]

[center][font=verdana][size=14pt]HomePage [/size][/font][/center]

[center][font=verdana][size=14pt]Forums [/size][/font][/center]

[center][font=verdana][size=14pt]Play Now [/size][/font][/center]

[center][font=verdana][size=14pt]Hiscores [/size][/font][/center]

[center][b][b][font=verdana][size=14pt]Features and Information:

Revision: 317 Loading 474

Professional Forums

Excellent Hosting as well.[/size][/font][/b][/b][/center]

[center][size=14pt][font=verdana]Server-sided information:
EVERY MINIGAME works (ones that are on teleport list)
Hiscores handler re-written
ALL anims are added server-wide
Thieving class re-written
Drop Tables re-coded for almost perfect economy
Custom Donator Zone, never seen before! [/font][/size][/center]

[b][center][size=14pt][font=verdana]Extra info:
Shops are barebones setup, Item up to ADAMANTITE in shop, limited quantity Same with low level skilling items.
XP Rates are SEMI LOW - If you plan to play for 2 hours and max out this is NOT the server for you. Items have meaning here, our ECONOMY IS Incredible.
[/font][/size][/center]

[color=red][size=14pt][font=verdana][center]MEDIA BELOW[/center]
